content: ग्रंथः [ग्रंथ् संदर्भे भावे घञ्] {@--1@} Binding, stringing together (<ab>fig.</ab> also). {@--2@} A work, treatise, composition, literary production, book; ग्रंथारंभे, ग्रंथकृत्, ग्रंथसमाप्ति &c. {@--3@} Wealth, property. {@--4@} A verse consisting of 32 syllables, written in the Anuṣṭubh metre.
